Key Match Events: Scotty Pippen Jr. delivered a terrific double-double performance vs. Bulls with 14 points, 4 rebounds, 10 assists, 1 steal, and 1 block.
Post-Match Reflections: Larsa Pippen reacted to her son Scotty Pippen Jr.'s impressive performance in the Memphis Grizzlies' narrow 126-123 loss to the Chicago Bulls on Monday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotty Pippen Jr. recently signed a multiyear contract with the Grizzlies, averaging 11.0 points, 3.8 rebounds, 8.3 assists, and 1.5 steals across the first four games.
Others: The Grizzlies entrusted Pippen Jr. with a multiyear contract, positioning him as the backup point guard to superstar Ja Morant.
